article_title: If You Have High Income, Your Taxes Are Going Up

article_metadata.description: As the April 15 deadline for filing 2013 income taxes nears, most of us are finding that Uncle Sam will take about the same share of our income as last year. But the story is very different for people at the top of the income ladder. Their taxes are going [...]
